text: "Ænema" is the third single off American rock band Tool's second studio album Ænima. The song was released in August 9, 1997. On the Billboard charts, "Ænema" was able to peak at #25 on Mainstream Rock Songs. In 1998, the song won a Grammy Award in the category of Best Metal Performance. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1996 songs Category:Grammy Award-winning songs
title: Ænema
